â€¢Managed varied aspects of national campaign for candidate and immediate family including strategic communications, logistics, and event coordination.â€¢Assembled and mobilized teams of people to work in fast changing, competitive and high profile environments resulting in successful execution of campaign strategy.â€¢Coordinated and led a two week International tour managing all aspects of logistics, public events and meetings with foreign dignitaries for the candidateâ€™s spouse including high profile guests and dozens of staff members.â€¢Represented the campaign, interfacing with globally recognized business and political leaders.

â€¢Managed varied aspects including strategic communications, logistics, event coordination, and supervising campaign staff for 7 political campaigns in races for candidates ranging from local party leaders to 3 US Presidential campaigns.â€¢Assembled and mobilized teams of people to work in fast changing, competitive and high profile environments resulting in successful execution of campaign strategy.â€¢Experienced in public speaking, presenting to more than 100 audiences, including media ranging from local to international outlets, radio, television and print interviews.â€¢Created press releases, graphical and written materials for fundraising letters, campaign literature, newspaper advertising, and other outreach materials.â€¢Organized and implemented a statewide referendum effort involving 100â€™s of contractors and 5 regional offices.â€¢Effectively supervised campaign employees and volunteers with diverse ethnic backgrounds in challenging work environments.

â€¢Managed team budget and coordinated all logistical operations while in US or abroad.â€¢Administered a small US outpost consisting of 90 buildings across 40 acres coordinating the work of American and foreign contractors engaged in security, infrastructure, public safety, and life systems.â€¢Insured success of engineering related missions to include construction, explosive demolition and explosive device neutralization.â€¢Trained, mentored, and led foreign allied personnel of diverse background while serving in Iraq, Oman, Morocco, and Kosovo.

â€¢Conceived, planned and directed a successful three day, multi-county bus tour, targeted to maximize candidate exposure in vital areas of Ohioâ€™s 15th Congressional District.â€¢Managed and delegated duties to a staff of over thirty.â€¢Directed all aspects of logistical operations for numerous rallies, meals, and business visits including coordinating a Presidential and other VIP visits.â€¢Coordinated earned-media events in conjunction with overall communication strategy.

â€¢Worked with principal of company to develop and implement a comprehensive business plan. â€¢Directed re-engineering of key business functions including human resources, purchasing, facilities management and information systems.â€¢Implemented new financial system, which reduced costs and improved efficiency.â€¢Established and maintained working relationships with legislators, executive branch agencies and their staffs, as well as local officials.â€¢Coordinated all activities for the president of Preisse Consulting LLC including liaison between his county-wide elected office and his private practice.â€¢Scheduled, researched, supervised office staff, coordinated special events production, and managed client relations.The House of LaRose

I worked with Frank when he was the advance rep for Meghan McCain during several stops on her very busy book tour in the NYC area. Frank handled all manner of problems in an efficient, friendly manner--from dealing with TV studio reps and their ever-changing demands to making sure that Meghan got to her stops on time, which isn't easy in a city like New York. Based on his intelligence, good humor, and problem-solving skills, I highly recommend Frank. He made what could have been a logistical nightmare run without a hitch.

The fast-paced, dynamic and high profile environment of a presidential campaign is a crucible which tests the skill, resolve, patience, and endurance of every person involved.  In all these areas Peter met and exceeded every expectation.  I heartily recommend Peter Donald.

John Busch gets the job done!  As the logistics coordinator for my Special Forces Team, I knew I could rely on John to help me accomplish the crucial mission of keeping my team equipped, supplied and always ready to accomplish our mission.  John is a creative and dedicated logistics professional who made the sometimes cumbersome defense logistics system work.  John tirelessly devised and executed  solutions never loosing sight of the goal of keeping my team "in the fight".  I heartily recommend John as a capable and dedicated colleague.
